title: 3/BD, $1500 off select units Mountain views, Oversized closets
posting_body: ['Seize your chance to make these peaceful, pet-friendly apartments set in the heart of Henderson, NV your home.', 'Conveniently located near the Cadence neighborhood with amazing city views of Las Vegas, make our community your new place to truly live!', '-Air conditioning with programmable thermostat                                                                                        Featured amenity', '-Ceiling fans in living areas and bedrooms', '-Onsite playground', '-Move-in with NO SECURITY DEPOSIT:', 'Only a small one-time payment', '-Worry-free 24-hour onsite maintenance', '-Resident social lounge with shuffleboard table and foosball', '-Barbecue pavilion and picnic area', '-Virtual Moving Concierge: Complimentary address change, set up home services and digital moving announcements', '-In-home washer and dryer                                                                                        Featured amenity', '-Energy efficient appliances including built-in microwave, refrigerator, and dishwasher', '-Fenced dog park with pet watering station                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity', '-Pet friendly (breed restrictions apply)', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Prices Change Daily', 'Flexible Lease Terms']
